title: UCTalent - Privacy Web3 Talent Network
description:
UCTalent provides the confidential on-chain referral recruitment connecting top blockchain and Web3 talents through a trusted, reward-driven network and Career AI Agent that helps talents to grow the career smoothy and safely.

Privacy-focused, AI-powered, and gamified with SocialFi, we’re SEA/APAC No.1 Web3 Job Board, revolutionizing hiring in the digital era.
